basics.name: Joshua Rudio
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer specializing in Backend Engineering work in Ruby on Rails.

interests.name: music
keywords: avid rap, metal, and country fan

work.summary: Lead Instructor for several classes in Redmond, WA area
highlights: Lead lessons and discussions on computer programming for 10-15 students
Plan and create lessons tailored around class skill level
Assess student progress and adjust to optimize learning
Work side by side with tenured Azure Support Engineers in delivering high quality technical support to Azure's top consumers.
Become a subject matter expert in a specific service in order to bolster the teams overall technical breadth and depth.
Enhance customer experience and build a trusting relationship by delivering solutions with compassion and knowledge.
Take ownership in small to medium sized features. Includes end-to end testing and deployment of features through AWS.
Work with other engineers to unblock issues in testing and debugging.
Ability to write and understand code in difference languages while learning on the fly to bolster knowledge in a certain technology.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
